summary: Adds 5 characters from the Game of thrones series using the armonizer mod armor
descriptionHtml:
[center]

This mod adds the following 11 characters from the game of throne series (apologies for the pictures, my game needs a re-install):

Eddard Stark - Found in the sleeping giant inn

Rob Stark - Found in the sleeping giant inn

Jaime lannister - Found in the bannered mare

The Hound - Found in Dragonsreach

Khal Drogo - Found in the four shields tavern

Jon Snow - Found in Jorrvorsk

Daenerys Targaryen - Found in the four shields tavern, dragonsbridge

Petyr Baelish - Found in Dragonsreach

Tyrion Lannister - Found in the silver blood tavern, Markath

Lord Commander Joer - Found in the Jarl\'s longhouse, Winterhold.

Brienne of Tarth - Found in Palace of the Kings, Windhelm


[b][u]Changelog 1.1:[/b][/u]

-added 6 new followers

-made all followers marriable

- corrected some name spelling errors

-tweaked the stats and filled in some missing info

Now, i know they aren\'t perfect, but they are the best i can do currently, will probably tweak them as time goes by.

This mod also includes my Stark Shield mod aswell, it is craftable, it is on the leveled list and you can buy it too.

[b][u]Important:[/b][/u]

you must have the ARMONIZER mod, found, here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27028 to use this mod, Dawnguard is needed too.

To install, just place the contents from file into the skyrim/data directory or install via NMM

to uninstall, simply remove with NMM or delete the added files.
[/center]
author: Dhegonus
